revised_title: Crustacea Observed During the Cruise of H.M.S. 'Challenger' in the Southern Sea
tldr: The author provides a preliminary report on the crustacea observed during the cruise of H.M.S. 'Challenger' in the Southern Sea, including descriptions of various species found in deep-sea and shallow-water environments. The report highlights the discovery of a large ostracod and a gigantic amphipod, as well as the prevalence of larger-than-usual species in deep-sea environments.
